H0.text: Which five books of the Old Testament make up the Pentateuch. Exodus

H1.text: Which five books of the Old Testament make up the Pentateuch. Leviticus

H2.text: Which five books of the Old Testament make up the Pentateuch. Numbers

H3.text: Which five books of the Old Testament make up the Pentateuch. Genesis

A4.text: The Torah is the compilation of the first five books of the Hebrew Bible, namely the books of Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy.

A5.text: The Book of Exodus is the second book of the Torah.
